member.name: M:DesignScript.Builtin.Dictionary.ByKeysValues(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Object})
member.summary: Produces a Dictionary with the supplied keys and values. The number of entries is the shorter of keys or values.
member.param: The string keys of the Dictionary

member.name: M:DesignScript.Builtin.Dictionary.Components
member.summary: Produces the components of a Dictionary. The reverse of Dictionary.ByKeysValues.

member.name: P:DesignScript.Builtin.Dictionary.Keys
member.summary: Produces the keys in a Dictionary.

member.name: P:DesignScript.Builtin.Dictionary.Values
member.summary: Produces the values in a Dictionary.

member.name: P:DesignScript.Builtin.Dictionary.Count
member.summary: The number of key value pairs in a Dictionary.

member.name: M:DesignScript.Builtin.Dictionary.SetValueAtKeys(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String},System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Object})
member.summary: Produce a new Dictionary with a list of keys set to the new values, possibly overwriting existing key-value pairs. These two lists are expected to be of the same length. If not, the shorter of the two bounds the number of insertions.
member.param: The keys in the Dictionary to set. If the same key already exists, the value at that key will be modified.
member.returns: A new Dictionary with the entries inserted.

member.name: M:DesignScript.Builtin.Dictionary.RemoveKeys(System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})
member.summary: Produce a new Dictionary with the given keys removed.
member.param: The key in the Dictionary to remove
member.returns: A new Dictionary with the key removed

member.name: M:DesignScript.Builtin.Dictionary.ValueAtKey(System.String)
member.summary: Obtain the value at a specified key
member.param: The key in the Dictionary to obtain.
member.returns: The value at the specified key or null if it is not set.
